name: Castel Brando

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is well worth a visit. Erbalunga itself is a great little place and only a short drive up the coast from Bastia. It's a very relaxed fishing village that is blessed with a number of good restaurants.
reviews.title: Charming hotel in sleepy fishing village

likes.disliked: — The wasps at breakfast (not much the hotel can do about these though!)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is attractive and well maintained with nice gardens, patio for breakfast, two good pools and lots of parking. Our room was spacious and tastefully decorated. Staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay and the breakfast was very nice too. I think they get the croissants from the bakery across the road so they were sometimes hot straight from the oven - delicious!
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend Castel Brando to anyone visiting Corsica.
reviews.title: charming hotel

likes.disliked: — nothing in particular, it was really nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Firstly, thank you everyone who wrote a review of this hotel, it was the reason my husband and I choose to stay here and we're so pleased we did.
reviews.title: peaceful and lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What an amazing hotel and village. We arrived late but we still received a very warm welcome and our room was beautiful. We only stayed two nights but are already planning our next stay. I can't recommend it enough.
reviews.title: relaxing hotel

likes.liked: — lovey garden and pool, relaxing atmosphere

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.text: Very nice welcome, incredible location and buildings, pool, very charming.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Internet access in lobby, library with novel in several languages, caring staff...
reviews.title: Quaint village

likes.disliked: — Pillows are terrible and sleep suffered

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Great quiet friendly hotel

reviews.text: No restaurant though, my advice is "Le Pirate" (very upscale) and the new "L'Esquinade" in the village, with fresh product and fresh fish at affordable price every night, and a nice view from their terrace.
reviews.title: What a relaxing experience

likes.disliked: — awkward car parking for an MPV

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our first taste of Corsica came via a 3 night stay @ this hotel.
reviews.title: Just as good the second time
Bad experience
reviews.text: Very unpleasant experience, unfortunately.The main building is situated right above a very busy road, so impossible to sleep, plus the noise from a construction cite on the other side of the hotel.

description: The hotel Castel Brando is a charming boutique hotel located in the splendid Cap Corse area of Corsica and built in a 19th century patrician mansion. With the Mediterranean sea only 100 meters away, the hotel is nestled into the charming village of Erbalunga. At your disposal, private parking, heated swimming pool, Jacuzzi, steam bath and massages, tennis court, Internet point and free wifi.
